name: Lux Fragrant Skin Body Wash
description: Lux Fragrant Skin is infused with Black Orchid scent and Juniper Oil and is inspired by the Exotic orchids & Floral oil designed to give a 12-hour lasting fragrance after shower. This product is Paraben Free and provides a luxurious floral fragrant leaving the skin soft.*Images for illustration purpose only.Product recieved may vary.
